name: MovieBuster
description:
Welcome to MovieBuster Team!

As an employee of top chain of movie chain stores it is of the utmost importance that you are the best of the best in what we do here... REWIND TAPES! That's the business, people come in to get their movies and it is up to you and you alone to make sure these people go home with properly rewound tapes.

All images and video are in the public domain
